mapper.insert: insert into t_user (id,user_no userNo,password,phone_no phoneNo,nick_name nickName,avatar,email,region,province_id provinceId,city_id cityId,district_id districtId,role,company_or_self_employed companyOrSelfEmployed,register_date registerDate) values (#{id},#{bookName},#{bookClass.bookClassId},#{bookAuthor},#{bookPubDate},#{bookPress},#{bookInventory})
mapper.select: select * from t_user where name=#{name} and password=#{password}
